Immaculate 2018 Ford Fiesta 1.0 Ecoboost Trend automatic with 54,000km and full Ford service history.

Balance of factory warranty until 23 November 2022 or 90,000km. Air con, power steering, electric windows, park distance control, smash and grab window tinting, bluetooth, multi functional steering wheel, apple car play etc etc.

R229,995. Finance available. Call Devon at Pengelly Autos 0217011986 or 0825364216 anytime. Pengelly Autos hand pick their vehicles, only buying from the owner. We do not buy from auctions, repos etc. We are a financial service provider (FSP no: 22186). Situated at 292 Main Rd, Tokai. We offer finance through all the major banks as well as offering extended warranties, insurance etc. We also accept trade ins. Website www.pengellyautos.co.za To apply for finance, please click on the finance tab on our website.

A full interior valet & exterior polish is performed on each of our pre-owned vehicles at point of sale. Extended Service Plans & Warranties are available as an optional extra and can be bolted on to your finance. A variety of finance options available, tailor made to suite your pocket.
